LanguageData.AlcoholAddiction.label: 알콜 중독
LanguageData.AlcoholAddiction.description: A chemical addiction to alcohol. Long-term presence of alcohol has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug.\n\nWithout regular doses of alcohol, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.
LanguageData.AlcoholAddiction.stages.withdrawal.label: 금단현상
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.label: 카페인 중독
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.description: 혈류속 알코올입니다. 사람들은 행복하지만 용량은 줄어듭니다.
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.warm.label: 술기운
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.tipsy.label: 달아오름
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.drunk.label: 어지러움
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.hammered.label: 취함
LanguageData.AlcoholHigh.stages.blackout.label: 심각함
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.label: 알콜 내성
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.description: 알코올에 대한 내성입니다. 이 내성이 심할수록 동일한 효과를 얻는 데 더 많은 알코올이 필요합니다.
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.stages.small.label: 작음
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.stages.large.label: 큼
LanguageData.AlcoholTolerance.stages.massive.label: 심각함
LanguageData.Hangover.label: 숙취
LanguageData.Hangover.stages.slight.label: 약함
LanguageData.Hangover.stages.strong.label: 강한
LanguageData.Hangover.stages.pounding.label: 강함
